mapper.select: SELECT ITEM_CODE , ITEM_TITLE , ITEM_DATE , ITEM_PRICE , ITEM_PLACE , ITEM_PEOPLE , CATE_CODE , LEFT(ITEM_START_DATE,10) ITEM_START_DATE , LEFT(ITEM_END_DATE,10) ITEM_END_DATE FROM ITEM_INFO

SELECT INFO.ITEM_CODE , ITEM_TITLE , ITEM_PLACE , PLACE_DETAIL , ITEM_DATE , ITEM_CONTENT , ITEM_PEOPLE , ITEM_PRICE , LEFT(ITEM_START_DATE,10) ITEM_START_DATE , LEFT(ITEM_END_DATE,10) ITEM_END_DATE , ATTACHED_FILE_NAME , IS_MAIN , ITEM_X , ITEM_Y , READ_CNT , CATE_CODE FROM ITEM_INFO INFO INNER JOIN ITEM_IMAGE IMG ON INFO.ITEM_CODE=IMG.ITEM_CODE WHERE INFO.ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode}
SELECT ATTACHED_FILE_NAME FROM ITEM_IMAGE WHERE ITEM_CODE=#{itemCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE ITEM_INFO SET READ_CNT = READ_CNT+1 WHERE ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode}
mapper.select: SELECT ITEM_CODE , ITEM_TITLE , ITEM_PEOPLE , date_format(ITEM_START_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') ITEM_START_DATE FROM ITEM_INFO WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{memberId}

SELECT ITEM_INFO.ITEM_CODE , ITEM_CONTENT , ITEM_PLACE , date_format(ITEM_START_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') ITEM_START_DATE , date_format(ITEM_END_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') ITEM_END_DATE , ITEM_TEL , ITEM_PRICE , IMG_CODE , ATTACHED_FILE_NAME , IS_MAIN , ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , ITEM_TITLE , ITEM_PEOPLE , IMG_CODE FROM item_info JOIN ITEM_IMAGE ON ITEM_INFO.ITEM_CODE = ITEM_IMAGE.ITEM_CODE WHERE ITEM_INFO.ITEM_CODE=#{itemCode}
